Model.Items

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Items.Item
      • Model.Items.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LongBow, LongSword

    public abstract class Weapon
extends Item
    Weapon is a sub type of class Item. One of the items a character can be equipped with during the game.
    See Also:
